results.description: Great Britain's Laura Deas pulls out of the skeleton World Championships in Canada because of whiplash.
results.shortTitle: Deas withdraws from World Championships
results.title: Laura Deas withdraws from World Championships

results.description: Olympic bronze medallist Laura Deas leads British challenge at skeleton World Cup in Canada.
results.shortTitle: Deas leads British skeleton challenge
results.title: Deas leads British skeleton's World Championship challenge

results.description: Great Britain's Laura Deas wins skeleton World Cup bronze in Canada - her first medal since Olympic taking bronze at the 2018 Winter Olympics.
results.shortTitle: GB's Deas wins skeleton bronze in Canada
results.title: Laura Deas: British slider wins skeleton World Cup bronze in Canada

results.description: Britain's Laura Deas wins her first skeleton World Cup medal since winning Olympic bronze in Pyeongchang in 2018.
results.shortTitle: Deas wins World Cup race bronze
results.title: Laura Deas wins skeleton World Cup race bronze in Calgary

results.description: Laura Deas withdraws from the St Moritz leg of the Skeleton World Cup tour due to illness.
results.shortTitle: Deas forced to withdraw from World Cup
results.title: Laura Deas withdraws from St Moritz leg of Skeleton World Cup tour

results.description: Winter Olympics skeleton bronze medallist Laura Deas finishes fifth at the European Championships in Igls, Austria.
results.shortTitle: Deas fifth in European Championships
results.title: European Championships: Laura Deas finishes fifth in Austria

results.description: Laura Deas hopes to add a European skeleton medal to her Winter Olympics bronze this weekend in Austria.
results.shortTitle: Deas targets European skeleton medal
results.title: Laura Deas targets European Championships skeleton medal in Igls

results.description: Wales' Laura Deas says she is aiming to use the World Cup series as a catalyst for success for February's World Championships in Whistler.
results.shortTitle: Deas wants to use World Cup as preparation
results.title: Deas wants to use World Cup as preparation for World Championships

results.description: This weekend's skeleton events at the IBSF World Cup and European Championships in Konigssee, Germany are cancelled for safety reasons.
results.shortTitle: Winter sport events in Europe cancelled
results.title: IBSF World Cup skeleton events and ladies' alpine World Cup cancelled because of heavy snow

results.description: Watch the moment Lizzy Yarnold becomes Great Britain's most decorated Winter Olympian by retaining her gold medal in the skeleton in Pyeongchang.
results.shortTitle: Advent calendar: Yarnold becomes GB's most decorated Winter Olympian
results.title: Advent calendar 2018: Lizzy Yarnold becomes Great Britain's most decorated Winter Olympian

results.description: British Olympic bronze medallist Laura Deas will miss this weekend's season-opening World Cup in Sigulda because of concussion.
results.shortTitle: Briton Deas to miss opening World Cup
results.title: Laura Deas: Olympic bronze medallist to miss season-opening World Cup

results.description: Olympic skeleton bronze medallist Laura Deas says it will be "strange" competing without the retired two-time Winter Olympic champion Lizzy Yarnold.
results.shortTitle: 'I'll miss our cups of tea in hotel corridors'
results.title: 'I'll miss our cups of tea in hotel corridors' - Laura Deas on life after Lizzy Yarnold

thumbnail.altText: Olympic champion Lizzy Yarnold and bronze medallist Laura Deas spent almost a decade together on the British Skeleton programme.
Olympic champion Lizzy Yarnold and bronze medallist Laura Deas spent almost a decade together on the British Skeleton programme.

results.description: UK Sport is accused of "bullying" national governing bodies with threats over public funding by two former board directors of the British Bobsleigh and Skeleton Association.
results.shortTitle: UK Sport accused of bullying over funding
results.title: UK Sport accused of 'bullying' over funding by ex-BBSA directors

results.description: A look at BBC Wales Sports Personality of the Year 2018 nominee Laura Deas.
results.shortTitle: Profile: Laura Deas
results.title: BBC Cymru Wales Sports Personality of the Year 2018: Laura Deas profile

results.description: Olympic medallist Laura Deas is among six British Skeleton sliders selected for this year's first World Cup races.
results.shortTitle: Deas among GB's Skeleton World Cup squad
results.title: Skeleton World Cup: Olympic medallist Laura Deas one of British sliders selected

results.description: Great Britain's most decorated Winter Olympian Lizzy Yarnold retires from skeleton after "10 amazing years".

results.title: Lizzy Yarnold: Britain's most decorated Winter Olympian retires from skeleton

results.description: Skeleton coach Andi Schmid gets the Coaches Lifetime Achievement Award after helping Great Britain to three medals at February's Winter Olympics.
results.shortTitle: GB skeleton coach honoured by IOC
results.title: Andi Schmid: Great Britain skeleton coach given IOC Coaches Lifetime Achievement Award

results.description: Olympic skeleton gold medallist Amy Williams says the sport took such a toll on her body that she has moved into a bungalow because she struggles with stairs.
results.shortTitle: Amy Williams: 'I'm a little bit broken'
results.title: Amy Williams: Skeleton left me 'a little bit broken'

results.description: Olympic champion Amy Williams says her skeleton career took such a toll that she has moved into a bungalow because she struggles with stairs.
results.shortTitle: 'I'm a little bit broken' - Williams
results.title: Amy Williams: I'm a little bit broken, says Olympic skeleton gold medallist

results.description: Skeleton will receive 7m of UK Sport funding in the lead-up to the 2022 Winter Olympics after several BBSA board members step down.
results.shortTitle: UK Sport confirms skeleton funding
results.title: Skeleton: UK Sport confirms funding after BBSA board members step down
